attributes.action: Do not rebuild parliament but put a modern building behind the facade..
attributes.background: Rebuiliding is a colossal waste of money for an unsatisfactory building, and we need constructive government, not the present pantomime, with semi-circular seating.  Part of the facade and the clock tower can be kept.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Decisions on the restoration and renewal of the Houses of Parliament are currently a decision for the Sponsor Body, which you can read more about here

https://www.restorationandrenewal.uk/about-us/the-sponsor-body
